description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored "Across Space And Time" on ecosystem architecture.
blurb: Ecosystems once limited by geography now describe dynamic, dispersed human organizations. This shift, fueled by the internet, calls for 'ecosystem architecture.'
